name: ruler

procedures: T1087.003::[Ruler] can be used to enumerate Exchange users and dump the GAL.
T1137.003::[Ruler] can be used to automate the abuse of Outlook Forms to establish persistence.
T1137.004::[Ruler] can be used to automate the abuse of Outlook Home Pages to establish persistence.
T1137.005::[Ruler] can be used to automate the abuse of Outlook Rules to establish persistence.

description: [Ruler](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0358) is a tool to abuse Microsoft Exchange services. It is publicly available on GitHub and the tool is executed via the command line. The creators of [Ruler](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0358) have also released a defensive tool, NotRuler, to detect its usage.(Citation: SensePost Ruler GitHub)(Citation: SensePost NotRuler)
